text: Attunity Introduces Unique Big Data Management Solution to Accelerate Economic Value of Hadoop  29 04:46:20 Attunity Introduces Unique Big Data Management Solution to Accelerate Economic Value of... -- BURLINGTON, Massachusetts, September 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- <-   BURLINGTON, Massachusetts , September 29, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Attunity Ltd. (NASDAQ: ATTU ), a leading provider of data management software solutions, announced today the release of Attunity Visibility 7.0 , the software's latest edition and the only Big Data Management solution to provide intelligence for scaling Hadoop deployments and aligning them with business needs. Designed to help enterprises accelerate the economic value of Hadoop, Attunity Visibility 7.0 offers a broad range of enterprise data usage analytics and monitoring across enterprise data warehouses and Hadoop. The new Attunity solution will be demonstrated live at Strata + Hadoop World, in Booth 246 and in the Cloudera Partner Pavilion, from September 29 - October 1 at the Javitz Convention Center in New York, NY . Due to the complexity of the IT environment and growing demands from business users, data management is often difficult for IT teams to deliver with performance improvements in a timely manner at a reasonable cost. With this release, Attunity Visibility 7.0 is the only solution to provide consolidated insight into business activity, data usage and workloads across both Hadoop and all the leading Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) platforms, via a single console. Enabling enterprises to adopt and scale out Hadoop securely, intelligently and strategically in a cross-platform Big Data environment, Attunity Visibility 7.0 also optimizes, monitors and enables the modernization of an EDW and Hadoop environment by showing where data and workloads should optimally reside. "We are pleased to see such a rapid adoption of the Hortonworks Data Platform by enterprises worldwide," said Matt Morgan , vice president, product and alliance marketing at Hortonworks . "A growing part of that success is attributable to our valued partner, Attunity, who will continue to work with us to that end as we empower enterprises to gain faster value and ROI from Hadoop. We look forward to helping many more customers via our joint solutions to meet their Big Data analytics goals." "The release of Attunity Visibility 7.0 is exciting because it empowers enterprises to provide detailed data usage analytics and monitoring across Hadoop and various platforms, to support charge-back/show back capabilities and increase enterprise optimization," explained Lawrence Schwartz , CMO at Attunity . "Moreover, Attunity Visibility helps organizations worldwide by helping them to prioritize investments and make more informed decisions right from the start." Learn more: Visit Attunity booth #246 or in the Cloudera Partner Pavilion #K19 at Strata + Hadoop 2015 View a demo of Visibility 7.0 Earn a chance to win an Attunity Google Cardboard - and other fun prizes Attend Attunity's Session in the Vendor Showcase on Wednesday, September 30 th - 5:30pm 5 Tips for Enhancing Your Data Architecture with Hadoop Presented by: Rodan Zadeh , Director of Product Management, Attunity See Attunity's CMO, Lawrence Schwartz , live on Wikibon's TheCube video on Wednesday, September 30 at 10:30am ET at Pillar 37, 517 W 37th St in NY (near the Javitz) Visit http://www.attunity.com/stratany15 About Attunity Attunity is a leading provider of data management software solutions that enable access, management, sharing and distribution of data, including Big Data, across heterogeneous enterprise platforms, organizations, and the cloud . Our software solutions include data replication , data flow management , test data management , change data capture (CDC), data connectivity , enterprise file replication (EFR), managed file transfer (MFT), data warehouse automation , data usage analytics , and cloud data delivery . Attunity has supplied innovative software solutions to its enterprise-class customers for over 20 years and has successful deployments at thousands of organizations worldwide. Attunity provides software directly and indirectly through a number of partners such as Microsoft, Oracle, IBM and HP. Headquartered in Boston, Attunity serves its customers via offices in North America, Europe, and Asia Pacific and through a network of local partners. For more information, visit http://www.attunity.com or our In Tune blog and join our community on Twitter , Facebook , LinkedIn and YouTube .
